< Bolzano
1:
--------------------
Text: Italian cruiser Bolzano:  A modified version of the earlier "Trento" class, she had a heavier displacement, slightly shorter length, a newer model of 203 mm gun, and a more powerful propulsion system, among other differences influenced by the "Zara" class that had followed the "Trento"s. "Bolzano" was built by the Gio.

Triplets:<Italian cruiser Bolzano
2:
--------------------
Text: Italian cruiser Bolzano:  Ansaldo & C. between her keel laying in June 1930 and her commissioning in August 1933.
